value:
$WmMPID_開花マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Bloom01,Face|Good technique comes from the heart.
Shannan taught me that.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wake up, everyone! We have
an emergency!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|*yawn* ...Commander Anna?
What could be happening this
early in the...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our supply convoy is on fire! Alfonse
and some of the others are dealing
with it now. We need to hurry!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'll be right there!$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_08,0|...We managed to keep it from
burning everything, but we lost
around half our food and gear.$k$pIt's unclear whether we'll be able
to make it all the way home without
supplementing our inventory...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|When we cornered the arsonist,
they threw themselves into the
flames rather than be caught...$k$pI have a feeling I know who sent
them our way.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Right. It must have been by Director
Letizia's command. She found a weak
point and exploited it.$k$pThat is how she appears to operate,
based on what we've seen so far.$k$pIf it serves her strategy, she won't
even hesitate to sacrifice her own
soldiers. She's merciless.$k$pAnd just as in battle, she sends
soldiers in as her shield while she
hides away someplace safe.$k$pShe's as cowardly as she is cruel,
like no one we've yet encountered.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Cruel indeed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'm not sure if it'll work, but I have
an idea.$k$pI want to try to talk to her.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|You mean...sit down and discuss
terms with her? Get her to promise
not to do any more harm somehow?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|No. Like we said, she's cruel.$k$pIf we approach her like we want
to appeal to her emotions, she will
only see it as weakness.$k$pSo, here's what we'll do...$k$p$Sbs150|
